fields.headline: Tech Weekly podcast
fields.bodyText: It's pod time. Aleks Krotoski, Bobbie Johnson and Charles Arthur discuss the controversy around Phorm, the targeted advertising service, and get some answers from chief executive Kent Ertegrul. Jay Rayner expands on Sunday's Observer into with blogs mogul (and his school friend) Nick Denton, and I do a bit of trans-Atlantic corresponding on SXSW. • Launch the audio player • The podcast feed URL • Subscribe free to Tech Weekly via iTunes • Visit our Facebook group • The Tech Weekly archives
